Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great asset to you, given its worth of $10000 to you. Considering its unique features and high quality, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $12000. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your budget. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
